mapper.select: select TABLE_NAME from information_schema.tables where TABLE_SCHEMA = #{db_number} and TABLE_NAME like 'memberService\_%'
mapper.update: CREATE TABLE `${table_number}_memberService` ( `gid` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `ftype` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `key` varchar(30) DEFAULT '', `version` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `available` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `initPriority` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `groupIds` varchar(100) DEFAULT '', PRIMARY KEY (`gid`,`ftype`,`key`), KEY `gid_ftype` (`gid`,`ftype`), KEY `gid` (`gid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
